name: Detective X：The liar
description:
This is a detective themed story-line adventure game. In the game, you will become DETECTIVE X. Your job is to help your agent Ryan and Jimmy to solve those mysterious cases.

The first episode: The liar is your first case. You need to rely on rational thinking and sensible analysis to make the right choices in order to solve the case.

The story begins when a middle-aged man was shot by a mystery person at St. Peter Church.

Hint:
There is more than more ending. Can you find the hiding ending?

Game Features:
• Restart: You can restart the game anytime you want.
• Fast Mode: You can activate this function after you pass the story once.
• Re-choose: You can always re-choose your selection.

You are welcome to tell us your version of Detective story. Please email us at: magicfantasyltd@hotmail.com.
